app.title: INCLUSIFY
app.tagline: Detect and improve LGBTQ+ inclusive language in academic writing.

home.heroHeadline: Write with respect, clarity, and inclusion.
home.heroSub: Identify outdated or biased language and get inclusive alternatives and references.

smartDetection.title: Smart Detection Engine
smartDetection.desc: Advanced NLP models detect problematic terms, outdated terminology, and biased assumptions in your text.

bilingualSupport.title: Bilingual Support
bilingualSupport.desc: Full support for both Hebrew and English, serving local and international academic communities.

gradedAlerts.title: Graded Alerts
gradedAlerts.desc: Issues classified by severity: outdated, biased, potentially offensive, or factually incorrect.

exportableReports.title: Exportable Reports
exportableReports.desc: Download comprehensive reports with flagged issues and suggestions to share with peers.

educationalResources.title: Educational Resources
educationalResources.desc: Built-in glossary explaining LGBTQ+ concepts and inclusive writing practices.

privacyFirst.title: Privacy First
privacyFirst.desc: Private mode available - no text stored without consent. Your data stays yours.

features.detect: Detect LGBTQ+ biased or outdated language
features.severity: Graded alerts with explanations and sources
